items.sentence: Much to Tom\'s surprise, Mary wasn\'t afraid.
Is Tom\'s car still parked behind your house?
I wish things could\'ve happened differently.
I think I forgot to tell Tom about the party.
I don\'t think Tom could get Mary to do that.
Tom is trying very hard not to slip and fall.
Tom is upstairs practicing his saxophone now.
Do you think Tom would be willing to help me?
Do you think anyone would care if I did that?
I didn\'t know Tom was living on Park Street.
I didn\'t know Tom was still studying French.
I didn\'t know that Tom did things like that.
I wish that I could go to the party with you.
Tom and his friends are swimming in the pool.
Many strange things have been happening here.
Tom immediately understood what was going on.
Tom is from a wealthy and influential family.
Tom swam for three hours yesterday afternoon.
I think that someone\'s knocking on the door.
Tom says he\'s always wanted to study French.
Tom certainly appears to have jumped the gun.
Tom certainly helped make our party more fun.
Tom challenged Mary to another game of chess.
There\'s no need for you to be here tomorrow.
There\'s not a whole lot happening right now.
I know we can count on Tom to do that for us.
The hospital where Tom was born is in Boston.
The measles vaccine is almost 100% effective.
Have you ever been criticized for doing that?
Would you like to go to the aquarium with me?
Would you mind explaining that diagram to me?
Now that Tom is here, we can start the party.
I get nervous when going through immigration.
Did you really think that I wouldn\'t notice?
That\'s exactly what I expected would happen.
Perhaps Tom will think I tried to poison him.
Tom knew that Mary was likely not to be busy.
Aren\'t you going to invite Tom to the party?
We can\'t get what we want without your help.
Tom couldn\'t think of anything better to do.
Have you learned all your classmates\' names?
Tom and Mary enjoyed a quiet moment together.
Can you suggest any other possible solutions?
Can you tell us anything about what happened?
Maybe you should do what Tom asked you to do.
Tom did that, even though he didn\'t have to.
Tom didn\'t blame Mary for what had happened.
Tom came to Australia looking for a new life.
Tom always takes Mary\'s part in an argument.
Tom and I just weren\'t meant to be together.
